amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on budgeting and funding of ongoing military operations overseas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3502 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 147.

action.text: Amendment SA 3502 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S7373-7374, S7377; text: CR S7373) To express the sense of the Senate on budgeting and funding of ongoing military operations overseas.
